Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Class ExecutionResourceTemplate

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.util.AbstractReferenceCountable
org.apache.wayang.core.platform.ExecutionResourceTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionResource, ReferenceCountable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractChannelInstance, FlinkContextReference, SparkContextReference, TensorflowContextReference
public abstract class ExecutionResourceTemplate extends AbstractReferenceCountable implements ExecutionResource
Implements various functionalities of an ExecutionResource.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor

    Creates a new instance and registers it with an CompositeExecutionResource.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExecutionResourceTemplate

      protected ExecutionResourceTemplate(CompositeExecutionResource container)
      Creates a new instance and registers it with an CompositeExecutionResource. If the latter is an ExecutionResource itself, then this instance obtains a reference on it during its life cycle.
      Parameters:
      container - that maintains this instance or null if none

  • Method Details

    • disposeUnreferenced

      protected void disposeUnreferenced()
      Description copied from class: AbstractReferenceCountable
      Dispose this instance, which is not referenced anymore. This method should always be invoked through AbstractReferenceCountable.disposeUnreferenced()
      Specified by:
      disposeUnreferenced in class AbstractReferenceCountable

      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • doDispose
